original: Åkesson, Nils Johan, lasarettsläkare, Finspång, f. 25/10/95 i Gbg av lärov:-adj. Jöns Å. o. Hanna Larsson. G. 23 m. med. lic. Hilda Bengtsson. Barn: Bengt-Åke f, 24, med. kand., Ingrid 30, Karin 39. — Stud :ex. i Gbg 14, med. kand. 18 o. med. lic. 24 i Lund. Div. förordn. v. klin. o. las. 20-25, tf. und:-läk. v. Landskr. o. Trelleb. las. samt e. läk. v. röntgenklin. i Lund 26, andre und :läk. v. Falu las. kir. avd. 27-30, därunder vik. förste und’:’läk. sexton mån., tf. las :läk. i Avesta 30, tf. aman. o. tf. und:läk. v. Maria sjukh. kir. klin. s. å., aman. där 31, därunder tf. un-diläk. åtta mån., tf. und:läk. där samt e. o. aman. v. Sabbatsb. sjukh. öronpoliklin. 32, e. läk. v. Maria sjukh. kir. klin. 33, und:läk. där 33-38, därunder vik. överläk. åtta mån., und:-läk. v. med. avd. där 38-39, förste und :läk. o. bitr. las :läk. v. Falu las. kir. avd. 39, las :läk. i Finspång sed. 43’. Bat:läk. i Fik res. 27.
translated: Åkesson, Nils Johan, hospital physician, Finspång, b. 25/10/1895 in Gothenburg to teacher's assistant Jöns Å. and Hanna Larsson. Married in 1923 to Hilda Bengtsson, medical licensee. Children: Bengt-Åke, b. 1924, medical candidate, Ingrid, b. 1930, Karin, b. 1939. Completed secondary school examination in Gothenburg in 1914, medical candidate in 1918, and medical license in Lund in 1924. Various appointments at clinics and hospitals from 1920-1925, temporary assistant physician at Landskrona and Trelleborg hospitals, and a radiology clinic physician in Lund in 1926. Assistant physician at Falun hospital surgical department from 1927-1930, including sixteen months as acting senior assistant physician. Temporary physician in Avesta in 1930, temporary assistant and acting assistant physician at Maria Hospital surgical clinic in the same year. Assistant physician at Maria Hospital in 1931, including eight months as acting junior physician. Temporary assistant physician at Maria Hospital and temporary assistant physician at Sabbatsberg Hospital Ear Polyclinic in 1932. Physician at Maria Hospital surgical clinic in 1933, junior physician there from 1933-1938, including eight months as acting senior physician. Junior physician in the medical department from 1938-1939, senior assistant physician and assistant hospital physician at Falun hospital surgical department in 1939, hospital physician in Finspång since 1943. Battalion physician in the Reserve from 1927.
